title: Ep. 359 - When Everything Is Racist, Nothing Is Racist
description:
The NBA looks to drop the term “owner," a Grindr hookup turns into assault and robbery, the Pope has rewritten the Lord’s prayer, and we look back on 100 years of female suffrage. Date: 6-04-2019
